resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "The local tiles for the 7-day incidence of new infections now also displays the 7-day hospitalization incidence. Since this key figure is only available at the state level, if a district is selected, the hospitalization rate for the respective state will be displayed."
"When you call a FAQ in the app, you are now forwarded to pages at coronawarn.app. You will find more details about your questions there."

"The assignment of certificates to people has been made more error-tolerant. The app now ignores different numbers of spaces in names, making it possible to assign the certificates to the same person despite such differences."
"Removed certificates are moved to the trash. They can be restored within 30 days."
